newsitem.title: USA: BEFORE THE BELL - Techs show some gains, AMR steady.
newsitem.headline: BEFORE THE BELL - Techs show some gains, AMR steady.

text.p: Shares of technology stocks rose slightly in light pre-opening trading on Friday.

AMR Corp shares were steady as the deadline looms closer for the airline and its pilots to agree on a contract agreement to avert a midnight strike, traders said. Shares closed at 83-1/8 on the New York Stock Exchange on Thursday.
Oracle Corp shares rose to 42 from their close at 41-5/16 and Cisco Systems Inc shares rose to 63 from their closing price of 62-9/16 on the Nasdaq.
Xilinx shares failed to budge much from their closing price of 47-5/8 despite the company backing Wall Street earnings estimates, which usually brings a small rise, a trader said.
Traders said pre-opening activity was light without much company news.
